node.title: ü•æüîµ Hike: Le Marais des Seigli√®res üê∏ü¶Ü
node.description:
üí° Click ‚ÄúRead more‚Äù/‚ÄúLire la suite‚Äù for full page ‚úÖ Joining = Accepting rules (see below)

== ‚≠ê Updates ‚≠ê ==

* üìÖ More cars = more seats. Seats: Albin (5), Thomas (5), Roman (5), Fran√ßois (3), Arthur (4), Marta+3 (4) join directly at hike start.
* We have a total of 26 seats

== üó®Ô∏è EN/FR üó®Ô∏è ==
ü¶Ö/üêì Our events are in English/French. Don‚Äôt worry if you are not fluent. Nos √©v√®nements sont en Anglais/Fran√ßais. Ne vous inqui√©tez pas si vous n‚Äô√™tes pas bilingue.

==üìç Meeting Point üìç==
Meet at parking "Esplanade du Souvenir Fran√ßais" near Parc Paul Mistral at **event start time SHARP**:

* ‚è∞ [https://www.osm.org/way/69486256](https://www.osm.org/way/69486256)
* ‚è∞ [https://goo.gl/maps/iNPSZcFVyTcM9VX2A](https://goo.gl/maps/iNPSZcFVyTcM9VX2A)

== üöó Transportation üöó ==
We ride our cars for \~25m. Then park at "**Le Pinet d'Uriage**":

* üÖøÔ∏è [https://www.osm.org/way/474805146](https://www.osm.org/way/474805146)
* üÖøÔ∏è [https://goo.gl/maps/Ussxrmf8cMMEPuvw5](https://goo.gl/maps/Ussxrmf8cMMEPuvw5)

== üöó Car share üöó ==
Car share is 2‚Ç¨ per person (fuel + "compensation" to get more drivers).

== ü•æüîµ Hike: Le Marais des Seigli√®res üê∏ü¶Ü ==

* üîµ/üî¥ Medium/hard for beginners
* üü¢ Easy for good hikers

We will do a loop hike. First, we will breathe in the fresh air of the forest before heading to the swamp. Then, we will loop back to our car by hiking through the residential area of Saint-Martin-d‚ÄôUriage. Along the way, we will try to catch a glimpse of a very old chestnut tree. Finally, we will drive back to Grenoble.

üó∫Ô∏è Topo & GPX track: [https://s.42l.fr/Pj7fJfyR](https://s.42l.fr/Pj7fJfyR) (click Export > GPX)
üì≤ Download GPX on your phone (Tuto: [https://binnette.github.io/GAC](https://binnette.github.io/GAC/))
üìè Distance: 14.7km
‚è±Ô∏è Time: \~4/5h of hike
üìà D+: 531m üòÖ

== üìú Rules üìú ==

* üö∂‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏èüö∂‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è GAC is about hiking ü•æ and making friends ü§ó, NOT flirting ‚õî
* üöÆ Don't litter in nature, even fruit peel. Decomposition: üçä 6 months, üçå 2 years, ü•ö 3 years
* üöó Join waiting list for car availability
* ‚è∞ Don‚Äôt be late, we won‚Äôt wait
* üí∫ Seats in car(s) are limited, only subscribe if sure to join
* ‚ùå Unsubscribe or üí¨ message if can‚Äôt join
* üöó Drivers: message me ASAP if you can‚Äôt join
* üíü You are responsible for your own health and security

== üéí What to bring üéí ==

* ü•æ Hiking shoes
* ü•¢ Hiking poles (optional)
* üßÉ Water (1-2L) + üç´ Snacks + ü•ó Lunch
* ‚ùÑÔ∏èüåßÔ∏è Cold and rain ready clothes
* üåû Sunscreen, üòé Sunglasses
* üòÅ Smile, üòä Happiness
* üíµ Car share money (exact change in cash)

***

Got questions? Just ask!
Albin from GAC

PS: Join our Telegram for more activities (üßó‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è, üèì, üé≥, üé≤, üé•, üéµ, üçΩÔ∏è). Message me on Meetup for the link.

== üó®Ô∏è EN/FR üó®Ô∏è ==
ü¶Ö/üêì : we speak English/French in all our events. Don't worry if your English/French is not that good. Nos √©v√®nements sont en Anglais et Fran√ßais. Ne soyez pas inquiets si votre niveau d'anglais n'est pas "suffisant".

== ü•æüîµ Hike: Le Canal du Beaumont üö∂‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏èüíßüå≥ ==

* üîµ/üî¥ Medium/hard for noobs
* üü¢ Easy for good hikers

Meet at parking "Esplanade du Souvenir Fran√ßais" near Parc Paul Mistral at **event start time SHARP**:

* ‚è∞ [https://www.osm.org/way/69486256](https://www.osm.org/way/69486256)
* ‚è∞ [https://goo.gl/maps/iNPSZcFVyTcM9VX2A](https://goo.gl/maps/iNPSZcFVyTcM9VX2A)

We ride our cars for \~1h. Then park at **"St-Laurent-en-Beaumont**":

* üÖøÔ∏è [https://www.osm.org/way/1162286415](https://www.osm.org/way/1162286415)
* üÖøÔ∏è [https://goo.gl/maps/RqjYERHw6Yx6Kdi49](https://goo.gl/maps/RqjYERHw6Yx6Kdi49)

We will start our loop by going up to the nearest mountain : Le Signal de St-Michel. Climb down until we cross Le Canal du Beaumont. Hike back by following this loooong and flaaaat canal until we get back to the cars.

Topo & GPX track: [https://s.42l.fr/p56QC8kk](https://s.42l.fr/p56QC8kk) (click Export > GPX)
‚ñ∂üí° Download GPX on your phone (Tuto: [https://binnette.github.io/GAC](https://binnette.github.io/GAC/))
Distance: 15.2km
Time: \~5/6h of hike
D+: 803m üòÖ

=== üöó share ===
Car share is 5‚Ç¨ per person (fuel + "compensation" to get more drivers).

== üí° Rules üí° ==

* üö∂‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏èüö∂‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è The GAC group is about hiking ü•æ and why not making friends BUT NOT about flirting or speed dating ‚õî
* üòç Hiking is about walking and enjoying nature
* Don't throw any dump üöÆ in nature even fruit pelt: üçå(2 years for decomposition), üçä (6 months); egg shell ü•ö (3 years)
* Subscribe on the waiting list. Maybe more cars will be available üöó
* Don't be (too) late üòá We won't wait for you at morning, especially if you don't send any message.
* Since seats in car(s) are "rare", please do not subscribe if you are not sure to join the event
* If you finally can't join us, please unsubscribe from the event or at least write a message here to announce your cancellation. üíú That way, we won't wait for you üíú
* If you are a driver and can't join, please send me a message through meetup ASAP, that way I can remove available seats üöó
* üíü You are responsible of your own health and security
* üò∑ Covid rules: [https://www.gouvernement.fr/info-coronavirus](https://www.gouvernement.fr/info-coronavirus)

== ‚ùî What do you need ‚ùî ==

* ü•æ Hiking shoes (maybe some snow in the forest)
* ü•¢ Hiking poles (why not)
* üßÉ Water (mini 1 or 2L) + üç´ Some snack + ü•ó food for lunch
* ‚ùÑÔ∏è/üåßÔ∏è Cold/rain ready clothes
* üåû Sun-cream / üòé Sun glasses
* üòÅ Your smile / üòä Happiness
* üò∑ Your mask as always (avoid contact and so on)
* üíµ Money for car share (exact change in cash)

***

If you have any questions, please ask!

See you! Albin from GAC.

PS: for more activities (cinema, tennis table, concert, etc), you can join our Telegram Channel. Just ask me by message on meetup or IRL (in real life).

We will hike in forest the morning to join "La Pierre Perc√©e". Have Lunch break there. Then go back to Saint-Jean-de-Vaulx by another way and hopefully enjoy some sun.

Topo & GPX track: [https://s.42l.fr/Apx86Scl](https://s.42l.fr/Apx86Scl) (click Export > GPX)
‚ñ∂üí° Download GPX on your phone (Tuto: [https://binnette.github.io/GAC](https://binnette.github.io/GAC/))
Distance: 18.6km
Time: \~5/6h of hike
D+: 528m üòÖ

=== üöó share ===
Car share is 4‚Ç¨ per person (fuel + "compensation" to get more drivers).

== üí° Rules üí° ==

* üö∂‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏èüö∂‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è The GAC group is about hiking ü•æ and why not making friends BUT NOT about flirting or speed dating ‚õî
* üòç Hiking is about walking and enjoying nature
* Don't throw any dump üöÆ in nature even fruit pelt: üçå(2 years for decomposition), üçä (6 months); egg shell ü•ö (3 years)
* Subscribe on the waiting list. Maybe more cars will be available üöó
* Don't be (too) late üòá We won't wait for you at morning, especially if you don't send any message.
* Since seats in car(s) are "rare", please do not subscribe if you are not sure to join the event
* If you finally can't join us, please unsubscribe from the event or at least write a message here to announce your cancellation. üíú That way, we won't wait for you üíú
* If you are a driver and can't join, please send me a message through meetup ASAP, that way I can remove available seats üöó
* üíü You are responsible of your own health and security
* üò∑ Covid rules: [https://www.gouvernement.fr/info-coronavirus](https://www.gouvernement.fr/info-coronavirus)

== ‚ùî What do you need ‚ùî ==

* ü•æ Hiking shoes (maybe some snow in the forest)
* ü•¢ Hiking pole (why not)
* üßÉ Water (mini 1 or 2L) + üç´ Some snack + ü•ó food for lunch
* üåû Sun-cream / üòé Sun glasses
* üòÅ Your smile / üòä Happiness
* üò∑ Your mask as always (avoid contact and so on)
* üíµ Money for car share (exact change in cash)

***

If you have any questions, please ask!

See you! Albin from GAC.

PS: for more activities (cinema, tennis table, concert, etc), you can join our Telegram Channel. Just ask me by message on meetup or IRL (in real life).

node.description:
üí° Read full page by clicking on "Read more/Lire la suite".

üî∫ Dedicated to intermediate skier, because there is only 1 track suitable for beginners.

== ‚≠ê‚≠ê Updates ‚≠ê‚≠ê ==

* More cars = more seats. Seats: Albin (5), Thomas (4)
* 6 by car: Albin, Houra, aa, Thomas, Mariam, Senapati
* 0 by bus:
* If other cars (otherwise bus):
* **Didn't answer the "bus or car?" question!!!**

== üó®Ô∏è EN/FR üó®Ô∏è ==
ü¶Ö/üêì : we speak English/French in all our events. Don't worry if your English/French is not that good. Nos √©v√®nements sont en Anglais et Fran√ßais. Ne soyez pas inquiets si votre niveau d'anglais n'est pas "suffisant".

== üéø Ski: Ski for intermediate 2023 - Session 3 ‚õ∑ #Chamrousse ==
üü® DO NOT BRING YOUR SKI (unless you have your own car) cause there is not enough place in my car. We will rent ski directly at the station.

Meet at **event time time SHARP** in parking "Esplanade du Souvenir Fran√ßais" near Parc Paul Mistral:

* ‚è∞ [https://www.osm.org/way/69486256](https://www.osm.org/way/69486256)
* ‚è∞ [https://goo.gl/maps/qPgvTu2icZmE1Ke97](https://goo.gl/maps/qPgvTu2icZmE1Ke97)

We ride our cars for about 50m. Then park our car(s) directly at Chamrousse ski station :

* üÖøÔ∏è [https://www.osm.org/node/8032968516](https://www.osm.org/node/8032968516)
* üÖøÔ∏è [https://goo.gl/maps/WTSWfj9KLp2QGsKF6](https://goo.gl/maps/WTSWfj9KLp2QGsKF6)

== üéø Ski renting üéø ==
We rent ski directly at ski station. Renting Ski + helmet \~30‚Ç¨

== üí≤ Ski Pass üí≤ ==

* 15,50‚Ç¨ beginner pass (I will take this one)
* 39‚Ç¨ for full station pass
* Map & price: [https://www.chamrousse.com/tarifs-ski-alpin.html](https://www.chamrousse.com/tarifs-ski-alpin.html)

If you are happy with your "ski teacher" you can help him (me) pay his (my) ski pass. Thank you üòáüíô

=== üöó share 6‚Ç¨ ===
Car share will cost 6‚Ç¨ per person (fuel + "compensation" to get more drivers). üò∑ You have to wear a mask in car.

=== üöå Join by bus \~18‚Ç¨ ===
There are many options and some need online reservation. See all options here: [https://www.chamrousse.com/bus-hiver.html](https://www.chamrousse.com/bus-hiver.html)

=== For drivers üöó ===
Drivers needs (mandatory):

* ‚õÑEither 4 winter or 4 four seasons tires
* üîóEither 2 car snow chains (\~25‚Ç¨ at Carrefour)
* üß¶Either 2 car snow socks

[https://www.service-public.fr/particuliers/actualites/A14389?lang=en](https://www.service-public.fr/particuliers/actualites/A14389?lang=en)

== üí° Rules üí° ==

* üö∂‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏èüö∂‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è GAC is about hiking ü•æ and making friends BUT NOT about flirting or speed dating ‚õî
* Don't throw any dump üöÆ in nature even egg shell ü•ö, fruit pelt üçå, ... üå≥ ‚ù§Ô∏è You
* Subscribe = you are 100% that you want to join. When you no longer want to join, please unsubscribe to leave your seat for the next one. And that way we won't wait for you in the morning.
* Subscribe on the waiting list. Maybe more cars will be available üöó
* Don't be late or at least send a message here.
* Since seats in cars are "rare", please do not subscribe if you are not 100% sure to join
* If you finally can't join us, please unsubscribe from the event üíú That way, we won't wait for you üíú
* If you are a driver and can't join, please send me a message through meetup ASAP, that way I can remove available seats üöó
* üöó Don't forget to bring the good amount of money for car share. And please don't forget to pay your driver.
* üíü You are responsible of your own health and security
* üò∑ Covid rules: [https://www.gouvernement.fr/info-coronavirus](https://www.gouvernement.fr/info-coronavirus)

== ‚ùî What do you need ‚ùî ==

* üÜî ID card or "residence permit" to rent ski at shop
* ‚õî NO SKI (I don't have place in my car. We will rent them at the shop)
* üß¢ A ski helmet (mandatory, rent one at the shop for 4‚Ç¨)
* üß• Snow/Warm clothes
* üß§ Ski gloves
* üëñ Ski pants
* üß¶ Ski socks or big warm socks
* ü•æ Any good/non slippery shoes to walk on snow/ice
* üßÉ Water + ü•™ Food for lunch + üç´ Some snack
* üåû Sun-cream / üòé Sun glasses
* üéí Backpack to carry food, water, sun-cream, ...
* üòÅ smile / üòä Happiness
* üíµ Cash for car share (bring the correct change)

***

If you have any questions, please ask!

See you! Albin from GAC.

For more activities (cinema, concert, etc), join our Telegram group. Just ask me by message on meetup or IRL (in real life).

node.description:

Subscribing = Joining = Accepting the rules (See rule section)

üî∫ This event is dedicated to beginners. If you are a good skier, leave your seat for somebody that never ski before. Also you can take a bus and go to a bigger station.

üëÄ I am not a ski teacher, but I will teach you the basics.

== ‚≠ê‚≠ê Updates ‚≠ê‚≠ê ==

* More cars = more seats. Seats: Albin (5)

== üéø Ski rentingüéø ==
We rent ski directly at ski station. The shop is open 9am-12:30pm and 1pm-5pm. So we will stop ski near 4:30pm to bring the ski to the shop.

Renting Ski + helmet \~20‚Ç¨ (Detail here: [https://s.42l.fr/kUBuCnzS](https://s.42l.fr/kUBuCnzS))

=== üöó share 5‚Ç¨ ===
Car share will cost 5‚Ç¨ per person (fuel + "compensation" to get more drivers). üò∑ You have to wear a mask in car.

=== üöå Join by bus 12.80‚Ç¨ ===

1. Take bus T64 at 7:36am in "Grenoble Gare Routi√®re". Go down at "Lans-en-Vercors Office de Tourisme (OT)". Cost: 6.40‚Ç¨ (Pay with phone by sending 3z to 93038 when getting on board)
2. Take the free bus (navette gratuite) at 8:55am from "Lans-en-Vercors Office de Tourisme (OT)" to "Montagne de Lans"
3. Enjoy your skiing day
4. Either try hitchhiking for free or take the same 2 buses back. Bus to Lans at 16:04 & 17:20. Bus Lans-Grenoble at 16:47, 18:02 & 18:07 (6.40‚Ç¨ again)

=== For drivers üöó ===
Drivers needs (mandatory):

* ‚õÑEither 4 winter or 4 four seasons tires
* üîóEither 2 car snow chains (\~25‚Ç¨ at Carrefour)
* üß¶Either 2 car snow socks
